    • Method Detail

      • setOptimize

        public void setOptimize(boolean b)
        Tell the linker whether it should run the peephole optimizer defaults to false
        Parameters:
        b - true if the ABCs should be optimized

      • setEnableInlining

        public void setEnableInlining(boolean b)
        Tell the linker whether it should enable inlining of functions. defaults to false
        Parameters:
        b - true if the functions should be inlined

      • setStripDebugOpcodes

        public void setStripDebugOpcodes(boolean b)
        Tell the linker whether is should strip out debug opcodes defaults to false
        Parameters:
        b - true if the ABCs should have the debug opcodes stripped out

      • setKeepMetadata

        public void setKeepMetadata(Collection<String> metadata_names)
        Tell the linker which metadata names it should keep. If null, it will keep them all except for "go to definition help" which is control by the stripGotoDefinitionHelp flag. Defaults to null.
        Parameters:
        metadata_names - A collection of metadata names that the linker will keep.

      • setTargetABCVersion

        public void setTargetABCVersion(int major,
                       int minor)

      • setStripGotoDefinitionHelp

        public void setStripGotoDefinitionHelp(boolean stripGotoDefinitionHelp)
        If the metadata to keep is null, this flag determines if "go to definition help" metadata is removed.
        Parameters:
        stripGotoDefinitionHelp - true to strip the metadata, false to leave it.

      • setStripFileAttributeFromGotoDefinitionHelp

        public void setStripFileAttributeFromGotoDefinitionHelp(boolean stripFileAttributeFromGotoDefinitionHelp)
        If "go to definition help" meta is being kept, this flag determines if we should strip the file attribute from the metadata.
        Parameters:
        stripFileAttributeFromGotoDefinitionHelp - true to strip the file attribute, false to leave it.

      • setRemoveDeadCode

        public void setRemoveDeadCode(boolean removeDeadCode)
        Enable or disable the DeadCodeFilter optimization step.
        Parameters:
        removeDeadCode - true if the DeadCodeFilter should be run.

      • setProblemsCollection

        public void setProblemsCollection(Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems)
        Set a problems collection for errors or warnings during link.
        Parameters:
        problems - the problems collection to receive errors or warnings.
